1.content:
You wake up in your room but something isn't right. You can't move, your head hurts something awful and your little sister is standing over you.

"What are you doing in here twerp? Why can't I move?" You ask.

"Oh sweet brother of mine, you're in no position to be asking questions. You see I'm in charge now."

"What are you talking about?"

"Sally made me a chip to put into your brain which allows me to control you. Very handy indeed."

You laugh. "Yeah, as if."

"You don't believe me?" Isabel asks. "Fine, lets try this on for size. Get up."

Your body immediately wrenches upwards and you stand up.

"Very good." Says Isabel. "Now walk over to the cupboard and lets see what we've got in store for you today."

You begin to walk to your cupboard. You couldn't believe it, what was going on? It's like you had no will of your own.
You open your cupboard to find all girls clothes.

"What shall you wear today?" Isabel asked herself.

Sally kissed you on the cheek, saying, "Good boy." Then said, "Chip off."

She said it in a high voice only a girl could produce. Free from the chip's control, you stood up only Sally stopped you with a wave of her hand. "You were chipped for a reason, Chris." Serious, she said. "Your sister has been targeted for kidnapping and maybe termination. We needed a body guard we could trust, or rather, control."

"What?!" Stunned, you demanded. "Who would want to kidnap or kill my little sister? I mean, sure, I pick on her a lot but that doesn't mean I want to see her get hurt!"

Sally sighed. "Isabel is like me." Serious, she explained. "We have a gift that frightens the adult world; I can build and use anything I put my mind to and I'm only nine."

You gulped. "What about Isabel?" Worried, you asked.

"Isabel can make things appear or change anything by just imagining it." Softly, Sally replied. "She gets me what I need to build what she wants and what I want to build; we help each other." She frowned. "Only someone figured out what she can do and they want to take her for their own purposes. If they get her to talk about me...."

"What can I do?" Wincing, you asked. "I'm just a normal guy."

Sally giggled. "That's where you are wrong, silly boy; I've been watching you a lot." Bemused, she said. "You are awful strong and you can't get hurt... ever!" she smiled, almost excitedly. "Isabelle can turn you into a pile of goo and you'll change back without a scratch on you!"

"She's done that to me?!" Startled, you asked.

Sally laughed. "Yeah but you don't remember it because I wiped your memory of it." Smiling, she said. "No one is invincible. Your body can't be hurt but your mind can." She winced. "Be careful, okay?"

"So what do we do now?" Nervous, you asked.

Sally sighed. "I turn the chip back on." Serious, she said. "We need you to protect us but we can't make it obvious." She looked at you as if she were pleading. "Let your sister have some fun; she can't hurt you no matter how hard she tries."

"She can just embarrass me to death." Pouting, you said.

Sally giggled. "Will you let me turn the chip back on or do we have to do this the hard way?"

You sighed then...

"Yes", you say. "Anything!"

Isabel turned off the control and you immediately felt your body relax, You thought about heading back home and then realized that your sister wasn't going to let that go unpunished. Beaten, you start walking behind her and the two of you made it to Sally's house. Fortunately, it didn't take very long and no one saw you.

Isabel rang the door bell but Sally opened a split second later. The chip has tracking hardware in it and she knew you were coming over. "Well, hi cutie!" she cooed, before starting to laugh. Isabel joined in and the two of them has a giggling fit. "I was going to ask how it went this morning Iz, but I see the chip worked!"

"Yes, in spite of his being uncooperative."

"He didn't want to put on the clothes at first. Especially the spankies."

You interrupt. "Those spankies don't work. They're too small, and..."

"They dont work? Too small?" Sally asked. "I picked those out for you myself. Come in and let's have a look."

Isabel giggled, hit the controls and you saw your feet step into Sally's house. You headed down into the basement - even though you have never been there, it was is your feet knew how to find it on their own.

"Okay, let's see what's wrong with those spankies. Lift up your skirt!"

"Isabel, did you see that? Let's try that again." said Sally, and smacked your bottom several more times. Unable to move, you simply held up the skirt (under Isabel's control) while the 9 year-old girl paddled your pantied bottom. Finally, she stopped. "See Chris? I think the spankies work just fine. I was able to spank you with no problem." She started laughing and Isabel joined in. Sally put her hand on your butt to feel the warmth and one of them, you're not sure who, pulled down the back of your panties a bit to see how red you were.

"Okay, I have a little accessory for the outfit that I think you'll like" said Sally. She took an armature out of a box, fitted it around your waist and adjusted it carefully. "Okay Isabel, you can let him go."

Isabel adjusted the buttons and you felt control return to your arms. You immediately let go of the skirt and smooth it down - as if you were covering something the girls hadn't already seen. Sally whispered something to Isabel who then pushed another button. The robotic armature that Sally had locked around your waist was a skirt lifter, and at a touch of a button would flip up your skirt, front or back. Isabel flipped up the back and when you reached around to push it down, she flipped up the front. Sally was very pleased with her invention and Isabel couldn't stop laughing.

"You know who would think this is hysterical?" asked Isabel.

"Who?" said Sally.
121.title: Sally

choices: You're rude to Jenny and Sally finally gets you over her knee.
1211.content:
You get a sinking feeling in your stomach even before the next words come out of your sister's mouth.

"I think Jenny would love to see Chris cheer for her. Don't you think so, bro?" She looks at you as she says this. Her eyes seem dark and cold.

"N-no, you can't!" you stammer, but to no avail. Isabel hits a button, the skirt flipper pops up the skirt in the back and Sally smacks you on the rear with her paddle again. You start to reach for the skirt to pull it down, and involuntarily you put your hands forward, each for a chair and bend over it, exposing your pantied bottom to the girls."

"Chris", starts Sally, "I don't think you have a choice. Besides, I need an excuse to take down your cute little panties and paddle you bare." She giggles, as she says this but you know she means business.

"Okay, I'll go. Just let me up and don't spank me!" you say.

Your muscles relax. You stand and everything seems normal except that you're still wearing the cheerleader uniform with the robotic skirt flipper.

Isabel pokes you in the back. "Get going. Unless you want to go without panties...". To emphasize her point, she flips up both the front and back of the skirt.

Mortified, you follow Isabel to the front door. Sally is right behind you, giggling. The three of you head down the street. It's only a block down the street to Jenny's. It feels like miles as you walk down the street. Mercifully, Isabel at leaves you the tiniest bit of dignity by leaving the skirt hang.

As you approach Jenny's house, your legs stiffen and walk themselves up to Jenny's door. Your arm reaches out and you see your hand press the doorbell.
1211.title: Jenny

choices: Jenny is freaked out and slams the door
Jenny comes over to help him up
12111.content:
You try to run, but can't move. Isabel has kept your feet firmly on the step. After a minute or two (which seems like an eternity), the door opens. Inside is Jenny and he has the strangest look on her face as she sees you and the two girls.

"Um hi, what the...?" asks Jenny.

"Hi Jenny" said Sally. "Chris has been working on something and he wanted to show you. Do you gave a minute?"

"What is this?" she asked, confused. "Why is he in a cheerleader uniform?, Chris, right? You two live across the street, right?"

Sally explained that yes, they did, and that Chris has been practicing something he wanted to show her. Isabel flipped up the back of the skirt and when Chris reached back to smooth it down, the front flipped up. The two 9 year olds cackled.

Chris, under the control of Isabel, turned and walked to the lawn. Isabel had been practicing on the 'Brother control simulator 2.0' and was able to easily cause Chris to execute several perfect cartwheels. The last one went wrong, and Chris ended up falling on his head, his arms and legs akimbo, his sweater partially up and the skirt up around his waist. It was rather undignified - even considering how it started.
12111.title: Cartwheels on the front lawn

122.content:
Isabel led you out of the house and toward her friend Sally's place. You were totally embarrassed walking outside dressed as you were but there wasn't anything you could do about it. You tried to keep your hands around you face so no one could tell it was you.

After an almost interminable walk you arrived. Isabel rang the bell and the two of you walked in.

"Well here he is," Isabel announced to her friend.

"Yeah, he is just as I had expected," Sally said.

You wanted to escape, but there wasn't anything you could do at the moment. You knew if you tried and failed things would get worse for you. With the control that Isabel had over you, things could get much worse very quickly.

Continuing Sally said, "She is all ready." You didn't know who this she was. You didn't even know if they were referring to you. "Follow me."

Sally led you and Isabel through her house to one of the bedrooms. Inside the room was a pretty girl wearing a baseball uniform. The uniform was a size or two too large for her. You recognized it as one of the uniforms worn by your high school baseball team in which you were a member. A second later it dawned on you it was your uniform. You recognized the number "27" on the sleeves.

"This is my sister, Jenny," she said. "I think you know each other. Jenny was in your grade at high school. You didn't know her well and hadn't really spoken to her. She was a cheerleader and you saw her during the games. Then it hit you like a ton of bricks. If she was wearing your uniform, then you must be wearing her uniform. Not only that, but it must be her clothes in your closets. She must have your clothes in her closets. She was being manipulated just as you were. But there was something different. She didn't have a look of terror which you assumed was on your face. She didn't seem to think anything was out of place. Now how she was dressed or how you were dressed. In fact she had a big smile when she stood to greet you. You didn't know if they totally brainwashed her or if she was just faking.

"Hello nice to meet you. I guess I've seen you around but we never really talked. It's surprising since you live so close to me," Jenny said as she stuck her hand out for you to shake.

You were too stunned to do anything. "What do you say?" Isabel reminded you.

"Oh, hello. Nice to meet you to," you said automatically.

"You have to forgive my brother. I guess he gets tongue tied when meeting a pretty girl."

"Oh don't worry about it. I have seen him on the cheer squad. He is very good. I guess he is a little bit shy too."

What do you say next?
122.title: Jenny (Sally's sister)

choices: You think you know, but everything you think is wrong.
1223.content:
"Well the reason why we came," Sally told Jenny, "was because Chris needed your help."

"He does?"

"Yes, he doesn't know a thing about putting on makeup. And I thought you could show him a few things."

"I sure could. It'll take some time but we can start with the basics and move on from there. You'll look great when you cheer."

You didn't say anything.

"Oh, I am sorry," Jenny said nervously. "You already look great, but you can look better cheering with makeup."

"It's OK, you two go into the bathroom and," referring to Jenny Sally said, "you work your magic on him."

"Chris, you learn everything she has to tell you," Isabel commanded into the device. You still dreaded what was about to happen, but you now couldn't help but to pay attention to everything that Jenny would say.

Once alone in the bathroom, Jenny had you sit down and she started with, "You know makeup is sort of an art form. You don't just put stuff on your eyes, cheeks and mouth and you are done. It takes planning. Your face is divided into sections, but all sections have to work together. It isn't only just the colors, but you have to consider the interplay of light and shadow, you have to also consider curves and framing, finally there is minimizing problem areas and maximizing your best features. Normally we will start with foundation, but I think we should pluck you eye brows first and see how that looks."

You listened to every word that Jenny had to say, you couldn't help it. She didn't have any makeup on herself while she wore your baseball uniform, but she still seemed to know all about it. You decided to start a conversation. "So how long have you liked baseball?"

"Oh, I have always loved baseball. I have been playing it all my life. I am so lucky I could get onto the team. But even if I couldn't I would have played anyway," Jenny told you with genuine enthusiasm."

You assumed all of this was a lie or a false memory. You had never seen her show any interest in baseball, but you really didn't know her very well. "I didn't know you liked it that much."

"Oh I do. Have you always liked cheerleading?"

"Well to tell the truth, cheerleading is something I just picked up all of a sudden. You could say it happened over night."

"Really? You are so good at it. The way you do all those flips and kicks and stuff." This brought back memories that you know you shouldn't have. You remembered all the routines that the cheerleaders did, along with how to do each stunt, like a backflip and everything else you needed to fit in with the other girls. The knowledge in your head was scaring you. It was really bad that Isabel could make you do anything, but she could also put knowledge into your head too.

You started to examine what you knew and try to see if everything was right. You started with the easy stuff, what do they call it when you hit the ball very far?" It is a....
1223.title: Something else

choices: Follow Isabell and Sally deciding what should happen to you
12233.content:
"It's called a home run. When the hitter hits the ball over the wall it's called a home run." You knew this because that is the time when you cheer. Jenny had picked up a few terms because as a cheerleader she needed to know when to cheer.

You knew that when the teams switched sides that was called an inning. But you didn't know the difference between the top and bottom of an inning. You knew the thrower threw the ball and the batter hit it. The batter had to get to the base before the ball got there. But you didn't know which base was which except the place where the hitter hit the ball was called the home base. You knew the people playing were called players but you didn't know there was a name for the players positions. You knew the hitter had to hit the ball onto the field and not into the stands, But you didn't know that was called a fowl ball. You thought you knew everything, but there was more things that you didn't know than you knew about baseball.

On the other hand, you knew what all the cheerleading motions were called, from the basic clean and clap positions to tumbling like the back handspring and roundoff. All of Jenny's knowledge had been transferred to you. All of these names seems to ordinary that you didn't question why you knew them. Not only did you know the positions, you knew how the squad used them and the chants they sang. You thought you had just picked them up since you were at the game everyday and saw them.

You were happy that known of your knowledge had been manipulated. If Isabel was playing with your mind you didn't know what you would do. What you didn't know was that while you were having your makeover, Isabel was in another room with Sally making changes to you. You didn't even notice that you were sitting with your knees together and one foot wrapped around your ankle like a girl would sit.

Isabel decided she wanted to take it further. Now that you had Chris' (Jenny's) knowledge of cheerleading, it was time to change your personal memories as well.

"Wow, Jenny! That was really good! Did you say you just started cheering recently?" Chris (Jenny) asked.

You decided to play along. You didn't know why your sister was forcing you to wear your cheerleading uniform, but if you were goign to go to the mall maybe you could convince her to let you wear regular clothes.

"Isabel, I think I should change first."

"Change?"

"Change clothes. I can't wear my uniform to the mall. I have a game in a couple of days. It'll get dirty." You knew you had several uniforms, but the mall was no place to be walking about in just your uniform.

"Jenny, I don't know, you look awfully cute in it."

"Will you wash it if it gets dirty? You know it has to be hand washed and then drip dry," you told her.

"What will you wear instead?"

"I don't know any old thing, I guess jeans and a t-shirt."

"How about one of your skirts."

"Fine, I'll wear a skirt." You were relieved that Isabel was considering letting you wear your regular clothes. You didn't wear a skirt all the time, but that was better than wearing just your uniform.

"OK, but if I don't like what you pick, you'll have to put on something else."

"I promise," you say. "This was getting better," you thought.

"OK, let's get you changed and then we'll go to the mall."

You and Isabel entered your house and went to your room. "Do you mind?"

"What?"

"You don't expect me to change right in front of you. You are my little sister." You had forgotten you had put on the cheerleading uniform right in front of her before.

"Jenny!!!"

"Look, it's not right for girls to see their brother's changing." You knew you couldn't stop her, but maybe you could appeal to her sense of decency."

"Fine, but remember wear a skirt not pants."

"OK...anything else?"

"Wear some tights."

"It's not that cold."

"I don't care."

"Anything else?" You thought that things were easing up. You didn't care if you wore tights instead of your usual anklets or no socks at all. What's the difference.

"Make sure your top is nice."

"I always wear nice tops, come on."

"OK. You get changed I'll wait right outside your door.."

Isabel left the room and you closed the door behind her.

You picked out your clothes, something casual for the mall, then got out of your cheer uniform and carefully put it away. Getting dressed you felt relieved that you were wearing your normal clothes. You didn't know why your sister made you wear your cheer uniform, but if you just played along, you might get through this without being embarrassed.

Meanwhile, Isabel was calling her friend Sally. "Yeah, he's getting dressed. He doesn't seem to know that he isn't putting on girl's clothes...I know, It all seems normal to him now...I can't wait to see what he picks out. You think I should send him back to change into something else no matter what he wears? Of course, I'll make sure he is wearing a bra....I already told him he has to wear tights....Wait, I have to get off the phone, he's coming out...." Then Isabel hung up her cell.

What is Chris wearing?

Isabel took one bottle of red polish and started working on your left hand. The only time she's seen polish applied is when your mother did her own nails and Isabel always watcher intently She was learning on you but did a surprisingly good job. Sally started on the toes of your right foot with her bottle of polish. It was bright pink. After doing couple of nails (she worked much faster and obviously had more experience) she sat back to admire her work. "That;s very pretty Lizzie. What do you think Isabel?"

Isabel stopped working on your right hand now and looked down at your feet. "Yes Sally, that's nice. Lizzie looks very pretty now." Your sister looks at you, smiles and gets back to work. After a minute or two she finishes you hand.

"This has to dry for a while Lizzie. Why don't you just stay here while Sally and I go to the kitchen for a drink?" Sally laughed. You weren't going anywhere until they decided to untie you. You felt ridiculous tied to a chair, a skirt pulled up to nearly your waist and your legs spread wide apart. Resigned to your fate, you nod. "Go ahead girls, I'll be fine here." you say.

The girls pick up Sally's remote (just to be sure) and scamper off.
133211111111.title: Paint his finger and toenails

1332111111112.content:
As soon as the girls left the room, you heard the doorbell ring. Sally and Isabel answered the door to reveal it was Jenny.

"Jenny what are you doing back so soon? I thought you said you had some errands to take care of." Asked Isabel.

"I do, but when I brought the shoes over I think my phone fell out of my pocket when I was looking at your brothers underwear. Mind If I go upstairs and grab my phone?" Said Jenny.

"No not at all, check his nails while you're up there. I think you'll love them!" Said Sally as both girls giggled.

Unsure what they meant, Jenny walked upstairs to where you were. When she walked inside she immediately noticed your nails and burst out laughing. You felt completely humiliated, how could it possibly get any worse. Jenny laughed for almost a minute straight, until she noticed her phone near your feet. She leaned over and picked it up.

"Nice color Lizzie, they suit you." Giggled Jenny as she wiped away a tear.

"Jenny please listen, you have to help. I mean come on don't you think this is a little too far?" You begged hoping she would untie you.

"I think the girls are missing something on you, the shoes. Your nails should be dry now I think. See you Lizzie." Said Jenny as she turned and headed down the steps.

"Did you find your phone, and how did you like his nails?" Asked Isabel.

"Found it, nice job on the nails. You guys can head back up now and put his stockings back on, as well as the heels. Oh by the way I goofed up earlier about my slumber party. It's tomorrow night, why don't you come at about 7? Don't dress him too fancy tomorrow, there will be lots of dressing up for the night! Be sure to keep his hands tied when you come, just in case. See you 2 tomorrow." Said Jenny as she walked out the front door.

"Lets go check on Lizzie! She's probably eager for her new shoes!" Giggled Isabel.

"And we can look in the bags for some accessories!" Added Sally giggling.
1332111111112.title: Jenny had forgotten her cell phone

13321111111121.content:
The last visit from Jenny was worse than the worse humiliation you could have imagined. Wouldn't you know that her phone happened to be by your feet so when she picked it up, she was looking directly up your skirt. A guy can't imagine a worse situation to be in than that. You're not sure about this slumber party though. The telescope in your room is good for looking at constellations, sure, but it's also pretty good at seeing what goes on in Jenny's backyard at some of her parties.

As some of these thoughts begin to enter your mind, Isabel and Sally come back upstairs. Sally looks at your fingernails. "Yep Isabel, they're dry. Toenails too." She begins to untie your knees then realizes her mistake. "Oops, I almost forgot this" she said, picking up her controller. She hit a button and your legs become stiff and immovable. She untied your knees. Isabel shook her head. "Tsk, tsk, Lizzie. That's most unladylike. You're going to have to learn to sit like a lady if you're going to be my new big sister."

"What?" you exclaim. "Izzy, there's *no* way I'm going to let you keep me this way." You also knew that your parents didn't know about Sally and her invention yet. They'd put a stop to this anyway so getting annoyed with your sister didn't matter. This would all be done by dinnertime. With your outburst, Sally hit that lever with her thumb that you knew all too well. It made your mouth clamp shut. "That's enough Lizzie." she said. Getting back to the task at hand, she slid the stockings up over your feet. Manipulating the joystick on the controller, she made your legs straighten out. She worked the stockings up your thighs and refastened the hooks. Isabel slipped Jenny's pumps onto your feet and Sally released your legs. You could move them again. Your hands were still tied to the chair.

"Okay Lizzie, ready to stand up?" asked Sally. You nodded your head since you still couldn't speak. Isabel untied your hands and arms. You shook them to get the circulation going again, put your hands on the chair arms and lifted yourself up. The shoes seemed like stilts to you. The trouble was, you don't know how to walk on stilts. To the young girls' amusement, you stood there teetering on 2" heeled pumps. Feeling rather exposed you pulled the skirt down and tried to cover up the best you could. Both girls watched with intense interest, holding back giggles as you tried to walk. After a few steps you sort of got it and managed to walk around the room. Sally released your jaw.

The phone rang. Isabel excused herself and ran out of the room to answer it. Sally got up and took your hand to help you steady yourself and get comfortable with the shoes. There was something about the way she held it - for her, it was more than just steadying her friend's brother she had forcibly crossdressed. No, this was something else. She had a tenderness about her touch that he had dreamed he could get from Jenny. But instead, Sally had it. He tried to get Sally's crush on him to work to his advantage.

"Listen, Sally, isn't there something I can do to get you to stop doing this? It's all going to stop when my parents get home tonight anyway." Sally just looked at you and you swear you could see stars and a twinkle in her eye. It was a more than a little scary. "Sally?" you ask. "Are you okay?"

Before she can say anything, Isabel comes back with the cordless phone. She hands it to you. "It's mom." You take the phone. Your mother tells you there's been a family emergency and that she and your father had to catch the next plane. They'd be gone for a few days. She knew that you and your friends had band practice on Saturday nights so she had arranged to have Jenny come over and babysit Isabel. You started to tell her that you weren't going to band practice tonight (seriously, how could you?) but she was in a hurry and hung up.

"What did mom say?" asked Isabel. "Um, that she and dad had to go to see grandma for a few days. Jenny is coming over tonight to babysit..." Isabel laughed. "Babysit who? You? Sally, does he look like a baby?" Sally held her sides laughing. "No Isabel, he doesn't." The idea of having time with Jenny was pretty cool though. You started picturing sitting with her all night on the sofa - just the two of you and then your sister broke the fantasy. "At least not yet." said Isabel.

Sally started digging through the bags looking for accessories.
13321111111121.title: Lizzie's new shoes

choices: Sally has to go home, but will be back in the morning!
133211111111212.content:
"Hey Sally what time do you have to be home?" Isabel asked.

"Oh not for another couple of hours, why do you ask?" Sally asked
curiously.

"Well it just came to my attention, if we're going to keep Lizzie like
this we're going to need more clothes. I mean we can't have her wear
the same outfit every day. I also looked through the bag a little bit,
do you know if there's more underwear at your house?" Said Isabel.

"I'll check when I get home, Christine had a huge amount of clothes in
her walk in closet that she stuffed in bags. Some she took with her
for college, but also to fill her closet with new clothes. Don't worry
I'm pretty sure I saw bag or 2 marked 'underwear' in her room. Big
bags." Grinned Sally as she watched you try to keep balance in your
pumps.

"Excellent I knew you were my best friend for a reason Sally. In the
meantime this will solve the problem, I knew we were missing
something." Said Isabel as she picked up a bottle of perfume spraying
you with it.

"Oh god did you have to do that? I smell like a bouquet of flowers."
You complained while coughing slightly.

"You smell lovely Lizzie, hey Isabel I got an idea. I think we should
keep Lizzie tied up for a little while each day, just to remind her
that we're in control. Maybe half an hour, or an hour each day, what
do you think?" Asked Sally.

"Sounds like a pretty good idea to me, we can tie her up each time she
has a new outfit on. Scratch what I said earlier, I love it!" Giggled
Isabel.
133211111111212.title: Something else

choices: Jenny gets a chance to learn how the controller works
You learn to watch your tongue
1332111111112121.content:
Sally thought her control chip was enough to keep Lizzie in control and wasn't sure they'd need to keep tying him up, But it was so fun! She was torn. Chris was the cute older boy down the street she had a major crush on. She was young enough to not really understand her chances with a boy so much older. Did he like her? If he did, would he still even speak to her after all of this? Sally was smart but still had a lot to learn about people, and boys in particular.

You heard the knock on the door and looked at the clock. It was already mid-afternoon It would be time for you to be leaving for your friends' house for practice soon so this must be Jenny. No problem. You'd send her home, thank her for coming over and then call your friends and say you were not coming today. Walking carefully and to the girls' entertainment, you walk slowly down the stairs. Sally had fully disengaged the control for your safety. "Interesting" you thought. Maybe I can use that to my advantage.

There was a second round of knocks. Knowing it was Jenny you opened the door with a surprising confidence, considering your predicament. It was Jenny as you surmised, but she was standing with another girl you didn't recognize. Your knees got all wobbly as Jenny greeted you and laughed. Her friend just said hello and introduced herself. "Hello, I'm Jenny's cousin Holly." She extended her hand and you did the same, shaking Holly's hand and welcomed her in. Jenny followed, looking at you in a funny way. She seemed surprised that Holly didn't think anything was odd.

"Um Holly, this is my neighbor Chris..." "Lizzie." interrupted Isabel who was coming down the stairs, "This is Lizzie." Jenny stopped the introduction. Looking at you, she said "I thought you had to go out and now... Why don't you explain this to Holly, whatever your name is. I don't think I could do it justice."

Isabel, standing on the stairs nodded her head. "Go ahead Lizzie." You invite the girls to sit on the sofa. Despite only having worn a skirt for a few hours you find that you somehow knew how to walk in it and the heels (although still very wobbly on those) and managed to sit without flashing your yellow panties. Isabel, Sally and Jenny have already seen them, but Holly still didn't know you were Isabel's brother.

Pie-eyed, Holly sat spellbound as you explained that Sally was a genius and had come up with some thing that can control people's behavior. Sally beamed and showed Holly the control unit. "Using that, the two of them made me cooperate in a game of dressup. As incredible as the control chip is, the rest is rather unremarkable." Unable to resist showing off, Sally picked up the control, made you stand and curtsy. She was laughing so hard that she threw you off balance and you fell, landing on Jenny and Holly. The teenage girls helped you back up to your feet. God, did you love feeling Jenny's hands on you. If she had helped you with your stockings earlier you probably would have, well, let's say it would have been hard to live down what would have been a very embarassing accident.

"Say, Chris, er Lizzie," began Jenny. "Sorry to hear about your grandmother or whatever. You mom called my mom and said I needed to sit? Are you going out?" she smiled. "And dressed like that?"

"Hell no, Jenny. I was going to say that you don't have to stay. I did have band practice but I can't go out like this. You might as well go and I'm really sorry" (turning to Holly) "that you had to be part of this." Holly was a really cute girl. You liked most girls anyway but Holly was *really* cute. "REALLY sorry." Your face turned bright red with embarrassment.

Holly spoke. "This is all really quite fantastic Lizzie. I never imagined anything like this was possible. You are to be congratulated Sally." Sally beamed again. "You're really a good brother to let the girls do this. Jenny, if Lizzie is staying here, then we can go."

Jenny had other ideas. "Holly, Lizzie is coming to my party tomorrow night. I'd like to learn how to use that gadget (looking at Sally) if that's okay with you." Sally nodded her head. "And Isabel's mom is going to pay me anyway, so we might as well stay the night. It will give me chance to practice."

Practice? Your crush is going to learn how to use the mind control your sister's friend planted in your head? And used to dress you as a girl? And in front of her cute cousin? Could this day get any stranger?

Jenny changed her tone. "Lizzie, a moment ago did you say something that I know your strictly religious parents would never allow in front of the young girls? Didn't you say 'Damn'?"

"No Jenny, I said 'Hell'." I said. Isabel and Sally both pretended to be shocked. "Lizzie!" said your sister, you can't say that! Sally giggled.

"After what you two put me through today - it's a wonder I haven't said a lot worse today."

Holly then said "my parents are the same way about my language. If I said either 'hell' or 'damn' in a tone like that, I'd be punished for it. Even at 16."
1332111111112121.title: Jenny knocks on the door

choices: A little panty warming to make her point
Panties down, bare bottom over Holly's lap
13321111111121212.content:
"Mom would agree with you Holly", said Isabel. You look at her, pleading for a little sympathy. Surrounded by these two willful 16 year old girls and Sally with her remote control, Isabel seemed to take on a whole new personality.

"Okay" said Jenny. "Holly, would you like to do the honors?"

"Of course. I'd be happy to" Holly said, sitting in the center of the sofa. Isabel pushed you towards her and with some help from Sally and the comptroller, you lifted your skirt and placed yourself over Holly's lap.
13321111111121212.title: You learn to watch your tongue

choices: End of the night, Jenny and Holly go home
133211111111212122.content:
"Pull your panties down a little bit little girl!" Ordered Sally.

To avoid anything else, you did as told and pulled down your panties. Holly started the smacking, while it wasn't really painful you were smacked about 30 times.

"Did you learn your lesson about language Lizzie?" Asked Holly mockingly. You nodded your head embarrassingly, Holly allowed you to get off her lap and pull your panties back up.

"I almost forgot I'm supposed to fix you some food. Lizzie why don't you go in the kitchen and prepare us all a meal?" Proposed Jenny.

"Jenny I'm actually pretty lousy at cooking, believe me you can ask Isabel and she'll agree." Isabel nodded in agreement. "Would it be alright if I ordered a pizza for all of us? I'll pay."

Jenny thought for a moment before allowing you to go ahead and make the call. To make sure you were really calling for a pizza, Isabel followed you to the phone and listened closely as you placed an order and gave the address. After you hung up, the phone rang again. It was Sally's mother who said it was time for her to come home. You explained that you were cooking dinner for everybody, Sally's mother allowed her to stay but come home when dinner was finished.

"Sally your mom was on the phone, she said when dinner is finished here you have to go home alright?" You said to her.

"Oh alright, but I was having so much fun." Said Sally sadly.

"I'll walk you home later, I don't want your parents or Isabel's getting mad at me for endangering someone." Said Jenny.

"Besides you'll be back here tomorrow morning remember?" Said Isabel. That cheered Sally up when she remembered there were more bags of her older sister's to bring over.

After 20 minutes, the pizza had arrived, Jenny answered the door and paid with your money. When you all sat down to eat, Jenny brought up a subject.

"When I 1st came here today, why was Lizzie tied to a chair if you have him, or her under your control?"

"We didn't want take any chances when we put on his makeup. Besides I think it helps keep him in place having him tied up for a little bit. Sally and I are planning on doing it again tomorrow." Giggled Isabel.

"Hey Jenny, we could that tomorrow for the slumber party. What's funnier than seeing a boy dressed in girl's clothes, having 1 tied up in girl's clothes!" Giggled Holly.

"That sounds like a great idea, the girls will love it!" Laughed Jenny.
133211111111212122.title: Panties down, bare bottom over Holly's lap

choices: ... realized how badly you wanted a relationship with Jenny
1332111111112121222.content:
Having a 9 year old Sally order you around was pretty humiliating, even considering you were laying across the lap of the pretty 16 year old girl who was prepared to spank you for swearing. Fortunately it wasn't much of a spanking and no one said anything about the pad that was taped in place to hold your boy bits out of the way.

The rest of the evening was pretty sedate. Jenny walked Sally back to her house and returned with a suitcase full of Christine's old clothes. Isabel really wanted to be in control of the room but in creating a remote control sister out her brother, she had pretty well given that up. She consoled herself to looking through the clothes and laying out outfits for you. You heard her in her room, laughing occasionally when she came up with specifically funny combination.

Holly and Jenny on the other hand, turned out to be cooler than you thought they might be. Jenny admitted she had never paid attention to you even though she knew about your crush on her. She couldn't tell how badly you were blushing because of the makeup but she knew. Holly was still dumbstruck by the fact that Isabel's friend Sally came up with this control chip. She convinced Isabel to let her play with the control and got you ready for bed by making you remove your clothes and put on one of Christine's old nightgowns.

Then she sat with you and talked while she removed your makeup. "You really are a handsome boy" the older girls agreed. "As fun as it is to be able to control you and put you embarrassing situations" said Jenny with Holly interjecting, grinning "and having your cute bottom over my lap for a spanking", I hope when this is over we'll be able to start over as friends."

"Does that mean I don't have to be the entertainment at your party tomorrow, Jenny?" Holly looked disappointed but Jenny said "Forget that, Lizzie. I feel badly for you, but not that badly. Besides, That spanking Holly gave you was just a patty cake spanking. You're going to get a much harder one tomorrow night at the party. " She grinned at you. "I might let Holly do it since she has more experience, or I might spank you myself." "Your sister and her friend used some amazing technology here and I want to play with it." she continued. "So no, Lizzie, the party goes through as planned."

Jenny got up, kissed you on the forehead and said she was going to put Isabel in bed. While she was gone, you...
1332111111112121222.title: Sally returns in the morning

choices: Sally knocks on the door at 8:00
13321111111121212222.content:
Jenny returned a few minutes later and placed an arm on Holly's shoulder.

"Holly and I are going to go home now. We need our beauty sleep for tomorrow night." Said Jenny while grinning.

"Goodnight Lizzie, can't wait for tomorrow. I'm sure all the girls will love to see how you're dressed through the evening. Lots of modeling!" Giggled Holly. You heard the 2 girls walk downstairs and close the front door behind them.

As soon as you heard the door close, you got your plan ready. While the remote did have control over your body, you realized that through sheer will you could slowly break free. It was late right now and you were exhausted, so you set your alarm to wake up at 5:30 to get out of the house. The thought of waking up Isabel crossed your mind but you dismissed it, you knew she was a heavy sleeper. Climbing in bed you fell asleep, as planned you woke up at 5:30. You quickly shut off the alarm before it made any more noise, climbing out of bed you pulled off the nightgown and got dressed. You put on boxers, jeans, t-shirt and a sweatshirt, finishing with socks and shoes. Opening your bedroom door, you crept down the hall as quietly as possible. Just as you reached the front door and placing your hand on the handle, you froze up.

"Going somewhere Lizzie?" Said Isabel at the top of the stairs. You were caught.

"What the? Isabel how i-impossible I thought you..." Words stuttered out of your mouth.

"Thought I was a heavy sleeper? Oh you really are easy to trick. I anticipated that you might try and escape through the night. After Jenny and Holly left I stood out your door and listened as you set an alarm, it woke me up." Explained Isabel.

Oh no you couldn't believe it. After so many years thinking she was a heavy sleeper you were completely wrong, and now you weren't going anywhere.

"It's still early in the morning and I'm going back to bed, so you can too." Said Isabel hitting a button the remote making you walk back upstairs to your bedroom. Before you shut the door, Isabel responded "You may as well leave your clothes on besides your shoes, Sally will be here by about 8:00. Enjoy the next 2 hours in boy clothes while you can, by 8:00 it's back to girl clothes!" Giggled Isabel.
13321111111121212222.title: ... planned your escape

choices: Sally had added speech control overnight and made you say what she wanted you to
133211111111212122222.content:
Last night you thought you had outfoxed your sister but she turned the tables on you. "Fine", you thought. Nothing ventured, nothing gained. You went back to bed and decide you'd come up with a new plan tomorrow. Come hell or high water, you were going to get out that damned party.

At 8:00 sharp, the doorbell rang. Sally was there with yet another bag of clothes, along with Jenny and Holly. The two teenagers were still in their pajamas and bathrobes. Isabel had texted Sally and told her of your escapades last night, so Sally left a few minutes early and rousted the teens out of their sleep to come over and help dress you. If it was bad that the 9 year olds were dressing you, how about a pair of annoyed 16 year old girls?

Jenny pushed past Sally and entered your house. "Okay, I'd like to go back to sleep. Let's get Lizzie back in her clothes so that Holly and I can catch another hour of sleep." Holly yawned her agreement. You briefly considered pushing your way out the door and hiding at a friend's house until your parents came home. Jenny anticipated your move, grabbed your ear and dragged you back up the stairs to Isabel's room.

The four girls had you stripped naked in no time. Even though you were basically being kidnapped in your own house, having girls touch you still got you excited. As that started to show, Jenny quickly handled the situation with a cold washcloth and then tucked and taped you back in. You wondered how girls all knew how to do that.

It wasn't the chip and controller getting you to cooperate this time. It was Jenny's clearly foul mood at having been woken early and her willingness to spank you; or have her even more attractive cousin do it. Either way, that embarrassment wasn't worth it since you were going to lose any. You actually helped the girls by putting on your underwear (Sally chose red silk today) yourself, fastened the stockings yourself and even managed to zip up a backzip dress after a little coaching by Holly. You're not sure if they were impressed by your skill with these difficult clothes or laughing at you. They certainly seemed to watch you with the eyes of a predator seeking prey.

You sat in the chair for your makeup. Jenny did it this time and it came out looking far more natural and beautiful than Isabel's attempts. "That makes sense" you thought, since Jenny is a teen girl and Isabel was too young to have used it before. Then came today's shoes - a pair of sandals with 3" heels that left your pink toes showing. The girls clapped with delight at how cute you looked. The dress Sally picked for you was a sweater dress that started with a full cowlneck, had long sleeves, came down to just above your knee and was extremely form fitting. The closure was a zipper that started partway down your back and zipped up to the back of your neck. You were going to ask for help with it and Holly was ready to assist. Instead, you asked how to get yourself and she told you. She seemed very eager to help keep you out of trouble.

By now it was nearly 9am. Jenny and an equally sleepy Holly headed back to Jenny's house to catch a few winks and get out of their jammies. That left you alone with Isabel and Sally who had you stand still while they paraded outfits back and forth to hold up against you to see how they looked.

Since your parents weren't around to put a stop to this, you decided to see if you could find a way to talk with Jenny's parents. After all, they wouldn't want their daughter to be involved in what was in essence a kidnapping, would they? You found that Jenny had left her comb in your room. Using that as the excuse, you told Isabel that you were going across the street to return it. "Sally, what's the range of that thing?" Isabel asked. "Oh, easily 200 feet. Plenty of range to get him back here if he doesn't come right back."

"Okay, I'll trust you Lizzie. You've got 5 minutes." Ecstatic, you headed across the street as fast as your 3" heels would let you.
133211111111212122222.title: Sally knocks on the door at 8:00

1332111111112121222222.content:
"What is it Lizzie? It's too early in the morning and we're trying to go back to sleep." Said a half awake Holly.

"Um Jenny forgot her comb, listen could I..." You were cut off sentence when Holly grabbed the comb and shut the door in your face.

Rather than knocking again and pissing off the girls even more, you decided to turn around and walk back to your house. Opening the front door you stepped inside and noticed Isabel and Sally sitting on the couch waiting for you.

"Took you long enough." Replied Isabel.

"What do you mean?" You asked curiously. The girls held up a stop watch which read 5:01.

"We said we'd give you 5 minutes Lizzie, not a second more. And for that there's punishment." Said Sally.

"Are you serious, because I was 1 second late come on that's not fair!" You complained.

"Oh really? Well guess what this also applies to your punishment, trying to escape in the middle of the night? Come on upstairs now Lizzie!" Commanded Lizzie as she pressed a button on the remote. You unwillingly walked upstairs into Isabel's bedroom.

"Sit in the chair Lizzie." Said Sally.

"What's going on?"

"Isabel and I already decided yesterday you would be tied up for hour every day at least, just to keep you in place. But because you were late and you tried to escape, we're going to tie you up for 3 hours!" Grinned Isabel.

"3 hours are you insane?? Isabel there is no way I'm doing that!" You turned around to leave but instead tripped over your shoes and fell into the chair.

Isabel and Sally wasted no time, they immediately grabbed the rope and tied your body to the chair. With your arms still free you tried to fight them tying you up, so they grabbed your arms and pulled them behind the chair tying your wrists and arms together. Like last time they finished tying your knees and ankles together. You angrily fought against the ropes holding you to the chair but there was no budge at all.

"Don't bother trying to fight against the ropes Lizzie, you have 3 good hours in that chair. In the meantime I think Isabel and I can show you your new clothes! What do you think Isabel?" Grinned Sally.

"I like the sound of that idea!" Giggled Isabel.

Both girls started going through the bag pulling out more clothes. They were in a huge giggling fit as they pulled out bras, panties and held them up to you to see how you'd look in them. You just sat just as humiliated as you were yesterday.
1332111111112121222222.title: Holly answered the door

13321111111121212222222.content:
After the girls had fun showing you bras and panties you would be wearing. They walked downstairs to the kitchen to get a drink.

"He sure is putting up a fight isn't he Sally." Said Isabel.

"What you mean upstairs? Don't worry I had the remote disabled, and I had a feeling he might trip in his new shoes. That's why it made it so easy us for to tie him up." Grinned Sally.

"Oh ok you had me worried earlier. I thought the chip was going faulty. You know as much fun as it is dressing him up in girly outfits, I'm having just as much fun tying him up." Giggled Isabel.

"Don't worry the chip isn't faulty at all. I tested it for almost 6 months straight, with heat and water, cold. No signs of damage at all. By the way Isabel I have good news." Explained Sally.

"What is it?"

"Last night when Jenny walked me home, I asked how her parents would react about a boy at a girls slumber party. She said not to worry, her parents were out of state on vacation. If this isn't too much to ask, could I sleep over tonight? My parents are going out of town for business." Said Sally.

"Are you kidding? You're my best friend of course you can sleep over, and Jenny's parents on vacation. That's just icing on the cake." Grinned Isabel.

Sally looked at the clock in the kitchen and noticed it was now 9:00.

"It's only 9:00, Lizzie still has a few more hours tied up, should we check on her? Maybe we can have a little fun while she's tied up!"
13321111111121212222222.title: Something else

choices: The girls continue tickling from your feet to the back of your neck
Isabel goes off looking for a feather. Sally tickles you in unusual places
133211111111212122222221.content:
They took their cold drinks upstairs.

"Hi Lizzie", said Isabel. "We were parched and needed sodas. I'd offer you one, but with your hands busy like that, there's no way you could hold it." Sally giggled. "And besides, you have to watch your figure..." Sally added. Isabel started a giggling her herself.

"You guys are just sick." you say. "You know Isabel, that if the situation were reversed, I would never do this to you."

"Oh you would too!" Isabel exclaimed. "If you had a control chip you'd have me doing all of your chores."

It was pointless to argue with her. She wasn't going to give up on this. At least not until your parents got back in a day or two. In the meantime you had to accept whatever they came up with. The worst part is that Jenny probably thinks you're ridiculous and you'll never have a chance with her.

Suddenly you twitch to one side and then the other. Sally is sticking her fingers in your rib cage and tickling you. You want to control your laughter but can't. You sat down and opened the book ready to fly through the homework you were sure was a piece of pie. However once you opened it that didn't seem the case. The words seemed all jumbled and the numbers just didn't make any sense. You flicked through the book and then cursed yourself for thinking you could do this. You needed help, fast. This was due soon. You needed someone smart and cool, there was only one option Sally Senpai. You felt yourself blushing at the thought of her.
But she would never help somone as clumsy and ugly as you, right? She probably didn't even know who you were. You could remember her coming over to play with your sister and you watching from afar.
But you had to do something or you might fail.

152232222212.content:
“Isabel! Come on! This is NOT funny.”, Chris protests, even as he helplessly feels himself compelled to don the ridiculous outfit little Isabel has in mind.

“Put it on! Put it on!”, enthuses Isabel as she jumps up and down in place next to him, thrilled at her total power over her big brother.

Chris’s face is beat red as he now stands in front of his bedroom mirror wearing bunny ears, a pair of his little sister’s small pink panties (with a fuzzy white bunny tail affixed to the back by a safety pin), and a too-tight girly tee-shirt that barely covers his chest. His legs are bare, but she has him put on his white tennis shoes, “To protect your bunny feet when we go outside”, Isabel gleefully informs.

“There is no way I’m going out”, Chris begins to protest. “Bunny-hop up and down on your bed for me!”, grins Isabel, still curious herself about how much she is able to control her big brother with the chip. Instantly, even while he tries to finish what he was saying, “-side like this!”, Chris suddenly feels the urge to climb on his bed and hop around with his tail sticking out and arms bent in front of him like a cute bunny-rabbit. The young teen is almost in tears now as he realizes how totally controlled he is by his little sister, but he still hops up and down on his bed while Isabel giggles with joy as she watches him. She is in stitches when she finally lets Chris stop hopping around, and tells him to kneel at her feet while she sits on his bed. Instantly, Chris is compelled to comply, and curls into a groveling ball at the foot of his own bed, and becomes a footrest for the his little sister.

“Oh, the fun we will have today! This is for all the times I got blamed for stuff you did. And for the times you made me do your chores for you, Chris. While Mom and Dad are gone, your new name is “Bunbuns”, and you can’t cry or complain, and you will always look happy and excited for me!”, Isabel says, almost thinking aloud as Chris stops complaining and starts to smile and raises his eyebrows in a happy and excited expression, despite his mounting horror at his totally robot-like response to everything his sister decides.

“This is the best day ever!”, declares your all-too-excited little sister, “I own you Bunbuns, and now let’s…”

info.brief_description: Your little sister has implanted a chip in your brain that makes you do what she wants.
info.description:
You're name is Chris, you're a pretty laid back kinda guy, aged 16. It's a fresh Saturday morning and you're ready to seize the day, only one problem, your sister Isabel, aged 9, has implanted a chip in your brain allowing her to be in complete control of your actions. Your weekend fun ends here.

Characters

Chris (You) - 16 - Loveable loser, loves to relax, watch TV, play video games, hang out with friends. Absolutely in love with Jenny from across the street, but too shy to do anything about it.

Isabel - 9 - Still incredibly girly for her age, has wishes to live in Barbie's dream house when she grows up. Hates you, her brother, for always picking on her. Is best friends with Sally, her slightly dorky friend.

Jenny - 16 - Lives across the street from you, very pretty popular girl who hardly notices you.

Sally - 9 - A very clever little girl who loves to whisk up inventions for Isabel. Has a crush on you.
